pages.text: $(li)The Lure enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/fishing_rod)Fishing Rod$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment decreases the amount of time needed for a fish to bite the hook.$(br)$(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.
pages.title: Lure

pages.text: $(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_lure)Ancient Tome (Lure)$(/l).
